description: Update one or more exclusion status for a list of recommendation resources.

parameters.name: recommendationResourceExclusions
parameters.description: A list of recommendation resource ARNs and exclusion status to update (dict) --- The request entry for Recommendation Resource exclusion. Each entry is a combination of Recommendation Resource ARN and corresponding exclusion status arn (string) --- The ARN of the Recommendation Resource isExcluded (boolean) --- The exclusion status.

nested_items.name: batchUpdateRecommendationResourceExclusionErrors
nested_items.description: A list of recommendation resource ARNs whose exclusion status failed to update, if any.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Recommendation Resource.
